name: Cyclops Feeding
description: Testing cyclops room and cyclops presence

entries.expectedOutput:
Cyclops Room
This room has an exit on the northwest and a staircase leading up.
A cyclops, who looks prepared to eat horses (much less mere adventurers), blocks the staircase. In his hand he carries a large, heavy sword.

Maze
This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.
